Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Exempts commuter vans from congestion pricing in New York city
Summary: Exempts commuter vans from the congestion surcharge and the central business district tolling program in New York city.
LawCode: Amd §§1299 & 1299-a, Tax L; add §1704-b, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to exempting commuter vans from congestion pricing in New York city
